title.rendered: All states, UTs, govt departments to integrate with national single window system by Dec: DPIIT Secy

content.rendered:
All the states, union territories and 32 central government departments will integrate with the National Single Window System (NSWS) by December this year, through which companies can seek all approvals and clearances for their businesses, a top official said on Thursday. So far 19 states/UTs and 27 central government departments are already onboarded, including Andhra Pradesh, Bihar, Goa, Gujarat, Himachal Pradesh, Jammu & Kashmir, and Karnataka, the Secretary in the department for promotio ..
NSWS enables the identification, applying and subsequent tracking of approvals for all integrated states and central departments.

“Going forward … we are targeting that by December 2023 all 36 states and UTs will be onboarded and all 32 departments of the central government will be onboarded … We are trying to bring the whole of the government on one single screen,” Jain said.

He said that both the centre and state governments will be there, so that it will be truly transfo ..

Source : https://tinyurl.com/3ehndutc
